title: mural in Rome, 2014, presumably modeled after Fascist-era type
content:
Painted mural in Rome at the office of a far-right organization. This is closest to which font? Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_0314_1_4459.jpg)
author: whc

comments.content:
Mostly generic Art Deco letters. The boxy legs on \_R\_ and \_K\_ are found on Toronto Subway [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/quadrat/toronto-subway/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073315/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/quadrat/toronto-subway/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/quadrat/toronto-subway/")  
More Art Deco letters with some similarities mentioned at [http://typophile.com/node/123203](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214073315/http:/typophile.com/node/123203 "http://typophile.com/node/123203")  
Don
